topic: How to containerize microservices using fastapi with Python 3.12+
prompt: Write a Python 3.12+ focused, accurate explainer for: How to containerize microservices using fastapi with Python 3.12+

response_parsed.title: Containerizing Microservices using FastAPI with Python 3.12+
response_parsed.summary: This explainer will guide you through the process of containerizing microservices using FastAPI, a modern, fast (high-performance), web framework for building APIs with Python 3.12+ and Uvicorn as ASGI server.
key_points: Understanding Docker and its role in containerization
Setting up development environment: Python 3.12, FastAPI, Uvicorn
Building and Running the Docker Container
Exposing the containerized service via Docker Compose

code_examples.code:
docker build -t fastapi-microservice .

docker run -p 8000:8000 fastapi-microservice

version_notes: Python 3.12 is required for the examples to run
caveats: Ensure your system has Docker installed before following this guide
This explainer focuses on a single microservice, containerizing multiple services requires additional steps and possibly an orchestration tool like Kubernetes
